title: Strengthening Technology-Integrated Instructional Design Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Process cultivating instructional design decision-making type exploration and technology integration strategy development through Q methodology-based self-reflection activities

learning_goals: Learners can objectively diagnose their decision-making types (critical thinkers/practical users/time-savers) when integrating technology into instructional design
Learners can derive at least three core elements to consider when establishing technology integration strategies through Q-methodology-based prioritization activities
Learners can propose practical solutions to constraints encountered when selecting and applying technological tools in instructional design contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
